ValidationRule.description: SSP-176 All the Line Item needs to be approved in Order to Put Order in Completed/ Approved or In Progress Status
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: TEXT(Salesforce_Order_Type__c) <> 'ZOR' && Approved_Line_Items__c < Total_Items_Count__c && ( TEXT(Status) = 'Completed' || TEXT(Status) = 'In Process/Package Preparation' || TEXT(Status) = 'Approved' ) && $User.Username <> 'support.gauri@gauri.com.syn'
ValidationRule.errorMessage: For this Status of Order, All the Order Lines needs to be in either "Approved" Status or "Not Needed"
